lead_paragraph: An article on Monday about the investigation of Giants receiver Plaxico Burress, who accidentally shot himself while at a Manhattan nightclub, referred incorrectly to a New York State gun law. Carrying a loaded gun without a permit could carry a sentence of 3 ½ to 15 years in prison whether or not prosecutors prove that the individual intended to use the weapon on another person; the sentencing range is not “up to seven years” if prosecutors fail to prove intent.
